game_description: You get 23 minutes to stop the OJI corporation from rendering the inhabitants of Bangalore incapable of conscious thought. Track, blast, slash and tear apart relentless killing machines that get in your way. Remember, you only get 23 minutes!
review_1: I liked the city so much, it feels real: cars, shops, neon boards, the sound of guitars, etc. A soundtrack is something, spent 5 minutes just listen to it
